title: Signal Journey
description: Schema for documenting signal processing pipelines with detailed provenance tracking. Files should follow the naming convention: sub-<participant>_task-<taskname>_signalJourney.json and use UTF-8 encoding. Uses namespaces within the 'extensions' property for domain-specific fields (e.g., 'eeg:', 'nemar:'). Note: Namespaces are reserved; adding new ones requires a formal proposal (see documentation).

sj_version.description: Version of the signalJourney specification being followed (Semantic Versioning MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

schema_version.description: Version of this schema file (Semantic Versioning MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

description.description: A brief human-readable description of the processing pipeline documented in this file.

versionHistory.description: Tracks changes made to this schema file over time.

version.description: The schema version for this entry.

date.description: The release date of this schema version.

changes.description: A summary of changes introduced in this version.

default.changes: Refactored InputSource/OutputTarget into separate definitions. Added 'inlineData' targetType.

pipelineInfo.description: General pipeline information (e.g., project name, dataset details). Specific fields TBD, allows additional properties for now.

processingSteps.description: An ordered list of processing steps applied.
